ingredients: 2 (15 oz) cans black beans, drained and rinsed well
3 medium tomatoes, diced or ½ of a 15 oz can diced tomatoes
1 (4 oz) can green chilis – hot, medium, or mild
1(10 oz can) enchilada sauce*, mild, medium, or hot
Optional Garnish: avocado, 1 cup plain Greek yogurt and 3 green onions, sliced
Optional Garnish: avocado, 1 cup plain Greek yogurt and 3 green onions, sliced
